entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 10:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -33.0°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Humidity: 66 %

Dewpoint: -37.2°C
Wind: S 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 in the morning. High minus 31. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 33.
